text: The WWE United States Championship is a secondary professional wrestling championship contested in the American promotion WWE for the men of the SmackDown brand. It was also competed for in the National Wrestling Alliance (NWA), Jim Crockett Promotions and World Championship Wrestling (WCW). Right now the champion is Jacob Fatu, who is in his first reign. He won the title by defeating LA Knight at WrestleMania 41 Night 1 on April 19, 2025, in Paradise, Nevada. ==Title history== ===Names=== Name Years NWA United States Heavyweight Championship (Mid-Atlantic version) January 1, 1975 – January 27, 1981 NWA United States Heavyweight Championship (Undisputed version) January 27, 1981 – 1991 WCW United States (Heavyweight) Championship 1991 –
